mapper.select: SELECT a.pro_no, a.pro_post_no, a.post_title, a.post_date, a.id, i.name, b.work_no, b.work_status, b.work_pri, b.work_start_day, b.work_start_time, b.work_end_day, b.work_end_time, b.work_update_day, b.lr_work_seq, b.work_group_no, b.work_content FROM pro_post a JOIN pro_work b ON(a.pro_post_no = b.pro_post_no) JOIN users u ON(a.id = u.id) JOIN user_info i ON(u.emp_no = i.emp_no) WHERE a.pro_no = #{proNo} AND a.post_type = 1 ORDER BY a.pro_post_no

SELECT a.pro_post_no, b.work_no, b.work_group_no, c.id, i.name FROM pro_post a JOIN pro_work b ON(a.pro_post_no = b.pro_post_no) JOIN work_person c ON(b.work_no = c.work_no) JOIN users u ON(c.id = u.id) JOIN user_info i ON(u.emp_no = i.emp_no) WHERE a.pro_no = #{proNo} ORDER BY work_no, name
SELECT work_group_no, work_group_name, work_group_seq FROM work_group WHERE pro_no = #{proNo} ORDER BY work_group_seq DESC

SELECT a.pro_post_no, a.post_title, a.post_date, a.id, i.name, u.profile_img, b.work_no, b.work_status, b.work_pri, b.work_start_day, b.work_start_time, b.work_end_day, b.work_end_time, b.lr_work_seq, b.work_group_no, b.work_content, c.work_group_name FROM pro_post a JOIN pro_work b ON(a.pro_post_no = b.pro_post_no) JOIN users u ON(a.id = u.id) JOIN user_info i ON(u.emp_no = i.emp_no) JOIN work_group c ON(b.work_group_no = c.work_group_no) WHERE a.pro_no = #{proNo} AND a.post_type = 1 ORDER BY a.pro_post_no

SELECT work_name, work_status, work_pri, work_manager, work_start_day, work_end_day, work_date, work_num, work_writer, work_update_day FROM pro_mem a JOIN pro b ON(a.pro_no = b.pro_no) WHERE b.pro_no = #{proNo} AND a.id = #{id} ORDER BY 1 DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE pro_mem SET work_name = #{workName}, work_status = #{workStatus}, work_pri = #{workPri}, work_manager = #{workManager}, work_start_day = #{workStartDay}, work_end_day = #{workEndDay}, work_date = #{workDate}, work_num = #{workNum}, work_writer = #{workWriter}, work_update_day = #{workUpdateDay} WHERE pro_mem_no = (SELECT b.pro_mem_no FROM pro a JOIN pro_mem b ON(a.pro_no = b.pro_no) WHERE a.pro_no = #{proNo} AND b.id = #{id})
